title: (x) "Taking the junk out of junkmail" wide superellips sans - Armchair Modern {Angel}
content:
Hi All-

looking to ID the typeface as shown here “TAKING THE JUNK OUT OF JUNKMAIL”. As expected, I have searched with close but no cigar-type results. This was seen in a printed publication called Twin Cities Monthly. Thanks in advance for your attention.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071205084157im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/junk_5663.jpg)

 [‹ Magazine cover fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071205084157/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38421 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Beautiful serif text face in Australian tabloid magazine - Fairfield {Brandon S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071205084157/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38551 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wesmo

comments.content: aha—the lowercase versions they must be using...good call. thanks much!
